title: Buy Natural & Non-Toxic Products for Your Home and Business
description: Buy Green & Natural Personal Body, Suncare and Household Cleaning Products by Green Cricket. Available in Canada and USA.
cleaned_text: Mr. WordPress —Cheryl, Etobicoke As a person with a debilitating chemical sensitivity, it is very difficult to find any products — including those that call themselves "green" — that I can use without adverse effects. You can imagine my surprise and joy to find products that are non-toxic. I use the Foaming Hand Soap, Fragrance Free Body Wash, as well as the Fragrance Free Shampoo and Conditioner.
